testimonialText: It is impossible to live without failing at something, unless you live so cautiously that you might as well not have lived at all - in which case, you fail by default.
People work better when they know what the goal is and why. It is important that people look forward to coming to work in the morning and enjoy working.
Imagine how different a world might be if more leaders took time to ponder the finality of death before racing off to war.
The belief that the world is getting worse, that we can’t solve extreme poverty and disease, isn’t just mistaken. It’s harmful.
